mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_STATUS_CODE IN (1, 2)
SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_JOIN_COUNT, MEMBER_REPT_COUNT, MEMBER_STATUS_CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_STATUS_CODE != 3 ORDER BY MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE DESC

SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, LOGIN_WAY, MEMBER_HOST_COUNT, MEMBER_JOIN_COUNT, MEMBER_PRO_PATH, MEMBER_REPT_COUNT, MEMBER_STATUS_CODE, MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_STATUS_CODE != 3 AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT GROUP_NO, GROUP_OPEN_STATUS, GROUP_NAME, CITY_NAME || ', ' ||DISTRICT_NAME AS DISTRICT_NAME, GROUP_STATUS, GROUP_CATEGORY_NAME, GROUP_ENROLL_DATE FROM "GROUP" G JOIN LOCAL_DISTRICT_CATEGORY L ON(G.LOCAL_CODE = L.DISTRICT_CODE) JOIN LOCAL_CITY_CATEGORY USING(CITY_CODE) JOIN GROUP_CATEGORY USING(GROUP_CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN GROUP_MEMBER USING(GROUP_NO) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT MEMBER_REPT_NO, MEMBER_REPT_CONTENT, MEMBER_REPT_STATUS, MEMBER_REPT_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MEMBER_REPT_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEMBER_REPT_DATE, REPORTER_ID || '/' || M.MEMBER_NAME AS REPORTER_ID, REPORTED_ID || '/' || M2.MEMBER_NAME AS REPORTED_ID FROM MEMBER_REPORT MR JOIN MEMBER M ON (MR.REPORTER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID) JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (MR.REPORTED_ID = M2.MEMBER_ID) WHERE REPORTED_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GROUP_REPORT ORDER BY GROUP_REPT_DATE DESC
SELECT GR.*, G.GROUP_NAME FROM GROUP_REPORT GR JOIN "GROUP" G ON(GR.GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) ORDER BY GROUP_REPT_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "GROUP" ORDER BY 1 DESC
SELECT * FROM "GROUP" ORDER BY GROUP_ENROLL_DATE DESC

SELECT G.*, GC.GROUP_CATEGORY_NAME,LDC.DISTRICT_NAME,LCC.CITY_NAME FROM "GROUP" G JOIN GROUP_CATEGORY GC ON(GC.GROUP_CATEGORY_CODE = G.GROUP_CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN LOCAL_DISTRICT_CATEGORY LDC ON(G.LOCAL_CODE = LDC.DISTRICT_CODE) JOIN LOCAL_CITY_CATEGORY LCC ON(LDC.CITY_CODE = LCC.CITY_CODE) WHERE GROUP_NO = #{gNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GROUP_MEMBER_REPORT ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT GR.*, G.GROUP_NAME,GM.LEVEL_CODE FROM GROUP_MEMBER_REPORT GR JOIN "GROUP" G ON(GR.RESPONDENT_GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) JOIN GROUP_MEMBER GM ON(GM.MEMBER_ID = GR.RESPONDENT_ID) ORDER BY REPT_STATUS_DATE DESC

SELECT MEMBER_REPT_NO, MEMBER_REPT_CONTENT, MEMBER_REPT_STATUS, MEMBER_REPT_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MEMBER_REPT_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEMBER_REPT_DATE, REPORTER_ID || '/' || M.MEMBER_NAME AS REPORTER_ID, REPORTED_ID || '/' || M2.MEMBER_NAME AS REPORTED_ID FROM MEMBER_REPORT MR JOIN MEMBER M ON (MR.REPORTER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID) JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (MR.REPORTED_ID = M2.MEMBER_ID)
